rootCause: The mdns_ready.sh script called D-Bus methods on the wrong object path. It used '/' instead of '/org/freedesktop/Avahi/Server', causing 'Method GetVersionString...doesn't exist' errors and preventing cross-node mDNS discovery. Both busctl and gdbus calls were affected, leading to D-Bus timeout fallbacks to slower CLI methods.
resolution: Updated both busctl and gdbus calls to use the correct object path '/org/freedesktop/Avahi/Server'. Updated test assertions to expect the corrected path in log output.
